attributes.action: road tax included in cost fuel
attributes.additional_details:
Put the veihical tax on cost fuel.
No more chasing non payers, wasting police time.
No one can get away with non payment even foreign visitors.
you pay a small amount for light users and non if you off the road for a while great for lorries not in use etc.
Disabled who are exempt could be given a fuel allowance once a year or 6mnths
